description:
Kouchin appears as a mature-looking woman, about 25 years old with shoulder-length black hair. She is ranked second strongest of the twelve in attack power, after Guren. She specializes in close range fighting with twin sai. Unlike the others, Kouchin does not resent Guren as much and is actually his close friend shown in that he refers to Kouchin as `Kou`. When Masahiro asks him about this, he refused to respond. She has also watched over Masahiro when he was a baby together with Guren. She is very observant and has a clear grasp of all of the Shinshou`s personalities. She is also very good at noticing small details. Her second name from Seimei is Keito, (慧斗).
Source: Wiki
name: Kouchin
